path



C_PATH_MAX

#define C_PATH_MAX 512
type: C preprocessor definition
description: value of max path

path_var

#define path_var(name) fstr_var(name, C_PATH_MAX)
type: C preprocessor definition
description: declare a fstr with C_PATH_MAX size on the stack

PathArray

typedef char PathArray[C_PATH_MAX];
type: C typedef
description: char array to store path

c_path_get_name

bstr c_path_get_name(const char *path);
type: C function
description: get path name

c_path_get_extension

bstr c_path_get_extension(const char *path);
type: C function
description: get path extension

c_path_get_shortname

bstr c_path_get_shortname(const char *path);
type: C function
description: get path shortname (no extension)

c_path_get_directory

bstr c_path_get_directory(const char *path);
type: C function
description: get path directory

c_path_get_root

bstr c_path_get_root(const char *path);
type: C function
description: get path root

c_path_get

bstr c_path_get(const char *path, uint index);
type: C function
description: get path element

c_path_count

uint c_path_count(const char *path);
type: C function
description: count path levels

c_path_append_string

void c_path_append_string(fstr str, const char *value);
type: C function
description: append string to path

c_path_append_bstr

void c_path_append_bstr(fstr str, const bstr *text);
type: C function
description: append string block to path

c_path_remove_last

void c_path_remove_last(fstr str);
type: C function
description: remove last element of path

c_path_set

void c_path_set(fstr str, const char *text);
type: C function
description: set path from string

c_path_set_bstr

void c_path_set_bstr(fstr str, const bstr *text);
type: C function
description: set path from string block

c_path_format

void c_path_format(fstr str, const char* format, ...);
type: C function
description: format path

c_path_format_list

void c_path_format_list(fstr str, const char* format, va_list args);
type: C function
description: format path - list version

c_path_sanitize

bool c_path_sanitize(fstr str);
type: C function
description: sanitize path, if invalid value will become INVALID-PATH
